mapper.select: /* getBookDetailByBookId sql */ SELECT BOOK_ID, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_DISCOUNT_PRICE, BOOK_STOCK, BOOK_REVIEW_COUNT, BOOK_REVIEW_SCORE, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION FROM BOOKS WHERE BOOK_ID = #{value}
/* getReviewList sql */ SELECT R.REVIEW_ID, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_SCORE, R.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME FROM REVIEWS R, USERS U WHERE R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND BOOK_ID = #{value}
